description: This Dart source file defines a central routing component for a Flutter mobile application. It manages route names, generates routes with associated screens, and includes logic for handling protected routes based on authentication state. The file also contains the splash screen widget responsible for determining the initial route based on user authentication status.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A central router class managing named routes and route generation logic, including access protection based on authentication status.

classes.name: SplashScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that determines the initial route by checking user authentication status and navigates accordingly.

methods.name: generateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on the provided route settings, returning appropriate screens or a default 'not found' message.

methods.name: _protectedRoute
methods.description: Creates a route that checks for user authentication; if not authenticated, redirects to login screen.

methods.name: _initialize
methods.description: Initializes authentication status during splash screen startup and redirects to appropriate initial route.
